about_the_game:
Meet the master!

Practice your hit confirms, with this official FOOTSIES collaboration costume! Tutorial Man becomes the FOOTSIES fighter, and is ready to teach you one thing or two about your neutral!

Important Note

To use this DLC costume, you need first to have unlocked Tutorial Man by either:
  • clearing the game's Tutorial mode OR
  • answering YES to the initial "unlock all characters" prompt OR
  • using one of the cheat codes listed in the Discussion threads.
detailed_description:
Meet the master!

Practice your hit confirms, with this official FOOTSIES collaboration costume! Tutorial Man becomes the FOOTSIES fighter, and is ready to teach you one thing or two about your neutral!

Important Note

To use this DLC costume, you need first to have unlocked Tutorial Man by either:
  • clearing the game's Tutorial mode OR
  • answering YES to the initial "unlock all characters" prompt OR
  • using one of the cheat codes listed in the Discussion threads.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i5 (4th generation or higher)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4400
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: This DLC pack requires around 2MB of disk space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 (4th generation or higher)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia Geforce 740M
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space
